title: Discipline!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>The game you recommended.... is quite hard, Dia-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Isn’t it? I saw Ruby and the others play it and tried it for myself, but I also found it quite difficult.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hmm.... I need to learn the special mechanics of the puzzles....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ah, Rina-san. Right there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Waaah, amazing! That destroyed so many blocks!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, and level cleared!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Dia-san.... for someone that claimed it was difficult.... you’re really good. I guess this game is perfect for you, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I’m just used to it a bit more than you are, Rina-san. I thought it’ll be a good warm-up for my brain, so I usually do 15 minutes of it before studying.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Eh.... you start playing.... then stop after 15 minutes? A-, amazing. Dia-san, you really are amazing....! Rina-chan’s board「Sparkle」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>W-, why are you looking at me like that!? It’s not something that praiseworthy, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
